GeneralInformation.School Mission: To develop all pupils to their full potential and to imbue in them the sense of self-worth.
School Philosophy, Culture and Ethos: Our motto, "The Best is in Me", encapsulates our desire to add value to every child and inspire him / her to do his / her best regardless of ability or background. We believe that every child is unique, with his or her own strengths and talents. We endeavour to create a safe and engaging environment where the learner is an active partner in the learning process, and nurture leaders who exhibit kindness, compassion and empathy. Our shared values (Self-worth, Integrity, Responsibility) guide us to respect the intrinsic Self-worth of individuals, uphold Integrity in all that we do and act Responsibly to ensure the well-being of staff and students.
To inspire our learners and bring out the best in them, we have Student-Centric, Values-Driven initiatives to ensure that we provide an engaging environment and enriched learning for our students.

We create a stimulating learning environment for our students to encourage learning through play, exploration and discovery. The beautiful school landscape, with different thematic gardens and eco-gardens serves as a Nature-based Community Classroom.  This aims to develop self-directed learning through the teaching of natural sciences and outdoor environmental education. The convenient use of ICT empowers our students to learn on-the-go with digital devices, anytime, anywhere, all within the school.
We celebrate diversity, unity and successes in LPS' journey towards excellence. We leverage on the rich opportunities offered to create exciting school experiences for our students.

We strive to provide students with holistic education. The strength of our programmes anchors on curricular customisation to level up low progress students and stretch the potential of our higher progress students. We have varied curricular and co-curricular programmes to cater to the diverse needs and aspirations of the students.
